```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
# Read in Data
stl_lead <- read.csv(here::here("data", "stl_blood_lead.csv"))

# Clean Name
stl_lead <- stl_lead %>% clean_names()

# Get Data Overview
skimr::skim(stl_lead)

# Summary Statistics
summary(stl_lead)

ggplot(stl_lead, aes(x = , y = )) +
  geom_histogram() +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Blood Lead Levels",
       x = "Blood Lead Level", y = "Count")
```

```{r}
# Calculate proportion of white residents per census tract
stl_lead_prop <- stl_lead %>%
  mutate(prop_white = (white / total_pop) * 100)

# View first few rows
head(stl_lead_prop)
```
